note:
It's okay for you to think of me as a fictional character in a series of Young Adult books (they'd be Light Novels, in some cultures...).

The characters in my stories are mostly the Gods and Goddesses of ancient Sumer. They act like they are sex-starved, but that's a complete ruse: it's about all they do. They have Human servants to do everything else. But, yeah - THAT, too.

That's Ki in the Header - the Embodiment of Life Itself.

https://gaianinthehereafter.wordpress.com/

fields.name: Excuse me, myth...
fields.value: I actually, really believe these characters are based on real, flesh-and-blood beings, who are incredibly long-lived. and still alive, today.

fields.name: I did not invent the brother/sister romances.
fields.value: The Ancients are not like us. Exactly. Kinda, though. We're wearing their genes.

fields.name: Gods
fields.value: Fuck everything up for everyone and need to shut the fuck up. WHAT did I say?
